forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 49. South southwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle between 7am and 8am. Mostly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 2 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
As the evening unfolds across Downtown San Francisco, a gentle veil of cloudiness drapes the city, hushed and contemplative under the dimming light. The air is cool, settling into the lower forties, inviting a cozy wrap of cardigan or scarf as one steps outside. The south-southwest breeze carries whispers of moisture, hinting at a slight chance of drizzle come morning, yet the promise of a mostly sunny day ahead imbues the atmosphere with an optimistic glow.

Sunday's approach heralds tempered warmth, peaking around sixty but likely dipping to a chillier fifty-six in the afternoon. The marine layer, that signature San Francisco mist, weaves its way through the landscape, perhaps teasing glimpses of the Golden Gate Bridge before the sun stretches across the city to scatter the clouds. For those drawn to the allure of the outdoors, a morning stroll along the waterfront or a leisurely trip to a neighborhood café could perfectly complement the day’s serene, albeit cool, charm. Dressing in layers will be key—light enough to navigate the fleeting warmth but substantial enough to ward off the evening’s encroaching coolness.
